meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rumbustious.
meanings.sent1: The rumbustiousnesses of the children at the party made it hard to hear.
meanings.sent2: Her rumbustiousnesses were evident in the way she laughed and played loudly.
meanings.sent3: The rumbustiousnesses of the puppy running around the house was both adorable and chaotic.
meanings.sent4: The rumbustiousnesses of the storm outside matched the chaos in the house.
meanings.sent5: The rumbustiousnesses of the crowd at the concert created an energetic atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of being noisy and unruly.
meanings.sent1: The teacher had to calm down the rumbustiousnesses in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The rumbustiousnesses of the fans at the game added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: Despite their rumbustiousnesses, the children were having a great time at the party.
meanings.sent4: The rumbustiousnesses of the wind outside matched the rowdiness of the group inside.
meanings.sent5: The rumbustiousnesses of the market on a busy day could be overwhelming.
